name: Pixie

grantsPowers.name: Wee One
grantsPowers.description: Attack: Ground Target Area Reduce Enemy Damage

grantsPowers.name: Pixie Dust
grantsPowers.description: Ground Target Area Increase Incoming Heals

grantsPowers.name: Pix Fix
grantsPowers.description: Passive: Increase Chain Heal Jumps; Falloff Reduction

description: Mischievious, energetic, and jovial in nature, Pixies are known to be an asset to their allies and a pesky nuisance to their enemies. A bit of the essence of Cybele emerges in each Pixie as they offer an ally a quick fix, use their magic dust to assist in healing, and use their conjury to alter the size of a foe with ease.
lore: Ever see a monster the size of a house turned into something no bigger than a mouse?
